name: Escape the Planet (Shiroishi Tsubasa)
description:
The game (future plan):
You wake up on a different planet, find ways to go back home.
Explore the planet and and solve some mysteries.

This prototype:
This is a just a demo of the game, it is nowhere near finished.
Try to survive as long as possible.
Use WASD or ArrowKeys to move.
Press Space or LeftClick to shoot.
Use scroll wheel to switch guns.
Press Q to skip dialogs.

If you think this is interesting, follow me for further updates!
